text: Blame It on Rio is a 1984 American romantic comedy movie directed by Stanley Donen and is based on the 1977 remake of the French movie Un moment d'Ã©garement. It stars Michael Caine, Joseph Bolonga, Michelle Johnson, Demi Moore, Valerie Harper and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Stanley Donen Category:American independent movies
